ðŸ“– Summary: The reddit2shorts repository is a TypeScript-based tool that automates the creation of YouTube Shorts from Reddit posts. It extracts content from Reddit, generates videos, and optionally uploads them to YouTube or TikTok, utilizing text-to-speech and background media.
